EXPERIENCE XP
Whenever you kill a monster or a player, you earn experience points. When enough experience points are earned, you raise a level. Things you should know about experience points:
* When damaging a monster, you get experience points.
* If you kill a monster of higher level than yourself, you get bonus experience points. If killing a monster of lower level you'll gain less experience points
See also: GROUP, SCORE
